description:
In a certain world, the long spanning conflict between the Evil God and the Virtuous God continued on.

Mankind, pushed to the brink of extinction by the Evil God’s servants, found a path of survival through the Virtuous God’s blessing, the Skills.

However, these powerful Skills has caused the development of the arts, warfare and industry to fall into a long lasting state of stagnancy.

In a world still haunted by the ever lingering shadow of danger, mankind only knows life in this halted time.

However, this changed with one swordsman’s understanding of [Technology].

This is the story of the second life of the man who, rewarded for his deeds of devoting his life to the way of the sword and technology, ascended to Godhood.>
